/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the glow of a bright sun, casting long shadows and creating a lens flare effect. The street is lined with towering buildings, their facades predominantly gray and white, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents. The buildings rise high into the clear blue sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight.

Parked along the side of the street are several cars, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sun's rays. Among them, a red truck and a white van stand out, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome scene. 

The street itself is a hive of activity. Several people can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day. A few cars are in motion, driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene.

On the right side of the street, a row of trees stands tall, their leaves rustling in the breeze. They provide a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. On the left side of the street, street furniture such as benches and trash cans are visible, providing amenities for the city dwellers.

Overall, the image paints a vivid picture of a day in the life of a city, with its towering buildings, busy streets, and the constant hum of activity.
